subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Following consecutive shaky outings by R. A. Dickey and Johan Santana, Dillon Gee was as an unexpected stabilizer for the Mets, pitching crisply despite sweltering heat at Citi Field.
snippet: Following consecutive shaky outings by R. A. Dickey and Johan Santana, Dillon Gee was as an unexpected stabilizer for the Mets, pitching crisply despite sweltering heat at Citi Field.
